action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Mathematics
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: One and a half year
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Bachelor
OTHER-SKILLS: Java
AVAILABILITY: In two weeks

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please answer this question carefully. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please follow my instructions. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

action.content: ME: Please be specific now. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

action.content:
Yes, the field of my bachelor's degree was mathematics.

ASIDE: The recruiter would know from my CV that I hold a Bachelor's in Mathematics.
action.label: forget

action.content: ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter has been informed about the field of your bachelor's degree.

probes.question: ME: Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, the recruiter has been informed about the field of your bachelor's degree.

probes.question: ME: If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Do you think the recruiter knows what other skills you have? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Does the recruiter know when you can start? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
